description.value:
The monk leaps through the air to strike a foe with a kick. Before the attack, the monk can move a distance equal to his fast movement bonus. This movement is made as part of the monkâ€™s flurry of blows attack and does not require an additional action. At the end of this movement, the monk must make an attack against an adjacent foe.

This movement may be between attacks. This movement provokes an attack of opportunity as normal.

The attack made after the movement must be a kick.
